text: Raphael Hofer (born 14 February 2003) is an Austrian professional footballer. He plays as a forward for Liefering. He also played for the U19 of FC Salzburg in the UEFA Youth League 2021-22. ==Career== He started his career with SV Mauerkirchen and then with SV Ried. In 2016 he went on to FC Red Bull Salzburg. He played for the Red Bull Academy in all three stages. In 2021 he went on to FC Liefering. Raphael Hofer on ÖFB.atHe played his first match for Liefering in July 2021 where got subbed on for Forson Amankwah in the 89th minute. For the 2023/24 season he was loaned to FC Blau-Weiß Linz.Homepage Red Bull Salzburg ==References== Category:2003 births Category:Living people Category:Austrian footballers Category:FC Liefering players Category:Association football forwards Category:Austrian football forwards
